success_example.title: Success
success

parameters.description: Account Statement OR Pledged Securities Transactions
curr_month, prev_1, prev_3, prev_6, current_year (use duration when from date and to date is not given)
date format = dd-mm-yyyy (use from date and to date when duration is not given)
date format = dd-mm-yyyy (use from date and to date when duration is not given)
pdf OR excel (if pdf or excel then user must give duration or from time to time)
1 or 0 (is_download and is_email can not be "1" at same time)
1 or 0 (is_download and is_email can not be "1" at same time)

success_example.example:
{
  "message": "Success",
  "data": {
    "loan": {
      "name": "loan name",
      "owner": "Administrator",
      "creation": "datetime",
      "modified": "datetime",
      "modified_by": "Administrator",
      "idx": 0,
      "docstatus": 0,
      "total_collateral_value": total_collateral_value,
      "total_collateral_value_str": total_collateral_value_in_string_format,
      "drawing_power": drawing_power,
      "drawing_power_str": drawing_power_in_string_format,
      "lender": "lender name",
      "sanctioned_limit": sanctioned_limit,
      "sanctioned_limit_str": sanctioned_limit_in_string_format,
      "balance": balance,
      "balance_str": balance_in_string_format,
      "customer": "CUST-1234",
      "customer_name": "John Doe",
      "allowable_ltv": allowable_ltv,
      "expiry_date": "expiry_date",
      "loan_agreement": "loan agreement pdf file path",
      "interest_due": interest_due,
      "interest_overdue": interest_overdue,
      "penal_interest_charges": penal_interest_charges,
      "rebate_interest_amount": rebate_interest_amount,
      "base_interest_amount": base_interest_amount,
      "margin_shortfall_amount": margin_shortfall_amount,
      "is_eligible_for_interest": 1,
      "is_irregular": 0,
      "is_penalize": 0,
      "doctype": "Loan",
      "items": [
        {
          "name": "isin entry name",
          "owner": "Administrator",
          "creation": "datetime",
          "modified": "datetime",
          "modified_by": "Administrator",
          "parent": "loan name",
          "parentfield": "items",
          "parenttype": "Loan",
          "idx": 1,
          "docstatus": 0,
          "isin": "isin",
          "security_name": "security_name",
          "security_category": "security_category",
          "pledged_quantity": pledged_quantity,
          "price": price,
          "amount": amount,
          "doctype": "Loan Item"
        }
      ]
    },
    "loan_transaction_list": [
      {
        "time": "date with time",
        "transaction_type": "Processing Fees",
        "name": "loan name-00001",
        "record_type": "record_type",
        "amount": "amount",
        "opening_balance": opening_balance,
        "closing_balance": closing_balance
      }

    ],
    "pdf_file_url": "pdf_file_url",
    "excel_file_url": ""
  }
}
